item.title: 中美贸易谈判引发加密货币看涨押注，比特币上涨
item.description: 在美国和中国计划举行贸易谈判的消息传出后，比特币随亚洲股市和美元走强而上涨。【原文：Bitcoin rose alongside Asian stocks and a strengthening dollar after news that the US and China plan to hold trade talks.】

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行行长对 2025 年再削减 75 个基点持开放态度
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，由于通胀持续缓解，菲律宾央行愿意在今年剩余时间内将关键利率再下调 75 个基点。【原文：The Philippine central bank is open to cutting its key interest rate by a further 75 basis points for the rest of the year as inflation continued to ease, according to Governor Eli Remolona.】

item.title: 台湾货币震荡引发保险公司如何为美国债券避险的分歧
item.description: 在岛内货币飙升导致其持有的数千亿美元美国债券受到审查之后，两家台湾寿险公司采取了截然相反的外汇套期保值方法。【原文：Two Taiwanese life insurers are taking opposite approaches to foreign-exchange hedging after a surge in the island’s currency put hundreds of billions of dollars of their US bond holdings under scrutiny.】

item.title: 铁矿石因中国人民银行下调准备金和中美贸易谈判而上涨
item.description: 铁矿石攀升的原因是中国降低了政策利率，并减少了贷款人必须保留的现金储备量，与此同时，华盛顿和中国政府同意进行贸易谈判。【原文：Iron ore climbed as China reduced its policy rate and lowered the amount of cash lenders must keep in reserve, at the same time as Washington and Beijing agreed to trade talks.】

item.title: 中国人民银行放宽货币政策，贸易谈判前景乐观，中国股市上涨
item.description: 由于中国央行降息以支持经济，而且高级官员同意在本周晚些时候与美国举行贸易谈判，中国股市走高。【原文：Chinese stocks advanced as the central bank cut interest rates to support the economy, and as senior officials agreed to hold trade talks with the US later this week.】

item.title: 世界贸易高速公路承受中美脱钩的压力
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战颠覆了整个行业，并迫使这两个最大的经济体分道扬镳，集装箱班轮公司开始切断连接中美两国的太平洋航运线路。【原文：Container liners are starting to sever shipping routes that link the US and China across the Pacific, as President Donald Trump’s trade war upends the industry and forces the two largest economies apart.】

item.title: I Squared Group 同意收购 Matterhorn Express 管道股份
item.description: I Squared Capital 和其他公司已达成协议，从 Ridgemont Equity Partners 和 Devon Energy Corp 收购 Matterhorn Express 管道的股权。【原文：I Squared Capital and other companies have reached a deal to acquire equity interests in the Matterhorn Express Pipeline from Ridgemont Equity Partners and Devon Energy Corp.】

item.title: 新西兰央行行长威利斯在奥尔辞职前寻求就银行资本问题举行会议
item.description: 根据《官方信息法》（Official Information Act）公布的文件显示，新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）在前储备银行行长阿德里安-奥尔（Adrian Orr）突然辞职前几周寻求与其会面，讨论银行资本要求问题。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis sought a meeting with former Reserve Bank Governor Adrian Orr to discuss bank capital requirements in the weeks prior to his sudden resignation, documents released under the Official Information Act show.】

item.title: 普拉博沃的转型之痛拖累印尼经济增长
item.description: 虽然人们普遍预计印尼第一季度的经济增长将放缓，但很少有人预测总统普拉博沃-苏比安托的新政府将成为主要的拖累因素。【原文：While Indonesia’s economic growth was largely expected to slow in the first quarter, few predicted a key drag would come from President Prabowo Subianto’s new government.】

item.title: 中国人民银行行长等中国高层官员将出席简报会
item.description: 中国央行行长是定于周三参加新闻发布会的高级官员之一，这凸显了旨在讨论稳定市场政策的此次活动的重要性。【原文：China’s central bank chief is among top officials set to join a press briefing on Wednesday, underlining the importance of the event aiming to discuss policies to stabilize markets.】

item.title: 韩元节后攀升，追赶亚洲同行
item.description: 在本周早些时候当地市场因假期关闭后，韩元周三上涨，追上了地区货币同行的涨幅。【原文：The South Korean won rose on Wednesday as it caught up with gains in regional currency peers after the local market was shut for a holiday earlier this week.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判乐观情绪削弱避险需求，黄金暴跌
item.description: 中美贸易谈判取得进展的迹象抑制了避风港需求，而印度和巴基斯坦之间的军事敌对行动也在升级，因此黄金下跌，结束了连续两天的上涨。【原文：Gold fell, snapping a two-day advance, as signs of progress on US-China trade talks curbed demand for havens even as military hostilities between India and Pakistan escalated.】

item.title: 中美就贸易谈判达成一致，油价延续升势
item.description: 由于美国和中国同意开始贸易谈判，使人们对世界两大经济体之间的紧张局势可能得到缓解感到乐观，石油在上一交易日反弹超过3%后继续走高。【原文：Oil pushed higher after rallying more than 3% in the previous session as the US and China agreed to start trade negotiations, raising optimism that tensions between the world’s two biggest economies may ease.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦称 5 架印度飞机被击落，士兵被俘
item.description: 巴基斯坦说，它击落了五架印度飞机，并俘虏了印度士兵，以报复印度周三早些时候的军事打击。【原文：Pakistan said it shot down five Indian airplanes and took Indian soldiers prisoner in retaliation to Indian military strikes early Wednesday.】

item.title: 压力增大，美联储将保持利率稳定
item.description: 人们普遍预计，美联储官员将在周三维持利率不变，以等待特朗普政府贸易政策的明朗化，此举可能会让总统和其他任何寻求美国央行下一步行动答案的人感到沮丧。【原文：Federal Reserve officials are widely expected to leave interest rates unchanged Wednesday as they await clarity on the Trump administration’s trade policies, a move likely to frustrate the president and anyone else seeking answers about the US central bank’s next move.】

item.title: 新西兰失业率保持稳定，求职人数减少
item.description: 新西兰第一季度的失业率出人意料地保持稳定，原因是在经济不景气的情况下，找工作的人越来越少。【原文：New Zealand’s jobless rate unexpectedly held steady in the first quarter as fewer people sought work in a sluggish economy.】

item.title: 律师报价 100 万美元为特朗普争取赦免权
item.description:
一位获得特赦的人回忆说，总统对他说："你比婴儿的屁股还干净。【原文：

One pardon recipient recalls president telling him, ‘You’re cleaner than a baby’s bottom.’

】

item.title: 贝森特与中国的会谈得到确认，美国期货攀升：市场综述
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对中国的经济竞争对手征收惩罚性关税后，中美两国将于本周举行首次贸易谈判。【原文：US equity futures jumped on confirmation that trade talks between the US and China would take place this week, the first since President Donald Trump slapped punishing tariffs on the nation’s economic rival.】

item.title: 新西兰央行称美国关税可能导致主要经济体经济放缓
item.description: 新西兰央行表示，美国的全面关税可能会抑制全球经济增长，并促使投资者押注更大幅度的降息。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank said sweeping US tariffs are likely to curb global economic growth and have prompted investors to bet on deeper interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国民银行因商业贷款而盈利超预期
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行今年上半年的盈利超过了分析师的预期，因为该公司向企业提供贷款的主要部门实现了增长。【原文：National Australia Bank Ltd.’s earnings topped analyst expectations in the first half of the year as the firm’s key unit of lending to businesses grew.】

item.title: 中国经济拯救计划因关税问题受阻
item.description: 中国正指望其 14 亿消费者帮助减轻唐纳德-特朗普的关税打击。但这一战略正遭遇一堵不确定的高墙，数百万个工厂岗位面临风险。【原文：China is counting on its 1.4 billion consumers to help cushion the blow from Donald Trump’s tariffs. But that strategy is running into a wall of uncertainty, with millions of factory jobs at risk.】

item.title: Holcim 在芝加哥市中心为计划中的美国分拆公司租赁空间
item.description: 瑞士水泥公司 Holcim Ltd. 表示，将把计划中的北美分拆公司迁至芝加哥市中心。【原文：Swiss cement company Holcim Ltd. said it will relocate its planned North American spinoff to downtown Chicago.】

item.title: 英美就降低关税的经济协议进行密集会谈
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，英美两国正在就一项经济协议进行深入讨论，该协议将减少部分关税的影响，本周将有一组英国官员前往华盛顿就协议条款进行谈判。【原文：The UK and US are in intensive discussions about an economic agreement that would reduce the impact of some tariffs, with a team of British officials in Washington to negotiate terms this week, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 谷歌为双子座保留最佳搜索数据，而非竞争对手的人工智能应用程序
item.description: 谷歌去年开始向一些人工智能公司提供在搜索结果中锚定聊天机器人回复的方法，但该公司的一位高管作证说，谷歌仍然为自己的人工智能服务 "双子座"（Gemini）保留了关键功能。【原文：Google last year began offering some artificial intelligence firms a way to anchor chatbot responses in its search results, but still reserves key features for its own AI service, Gemini, a company executive testified.】

item.title: 扩展数据源计划推动隔夜交易
item.description: 在负责发布实时交易数据的委员会表示正在考虑延长营业时间之后，最大的公共交易所提供隔夜交易的努力又向前迈进了一步。【原文：Efforts by the biggest public exchanges to offer overnight trading moved a step closer after the committee responsible for posting real-time trading data said it’s looking to extend operating hours.】

item.title: 挑战者称澳大利亚基金应加大信贷投资
item.description: 挑战者投资管理公司（Challenger Investment Management）投资战略主管表示，澳大利亚养老基金应考虑更多地投资于本币信贷产品，因为近期美元的下跌可能会给其不断扩大的海外投资组合带来风险。【原文：Australia’s pension funds should consider investing more in local-currency credit products as the greenback’s recent decline may pose risks to their expanding overseas portfolios, according to the head of investment strategy at Challenger Investment Management.】

item.title: 奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）和保守党就印度税收条款抨击 "双层基尔"（Two-Tier Kier
item.description: 英国改革党领导人奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）和英国主要反对党保守党就英国与印度达成的新贸易协议抨击英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer），批评其中一项条款将使一些印度工人在英国少缴税。【原文：Reform UK leader Nigel Farage and Britain’s main opposition Conservative Party attacked Prime Minister Keir Starmer over the country’s new trade deal with India, criticizing a provision that would see some Indian workers pay less tax in the UK.】

item.title: Marvell 因经济不景气推迟投资者日活动，股价下挫
item.description: 芯片制造商 Marvell Technology Inc. 以经济 "不确定 "为由下调了收入预期上限并推迟了投资者日活动，该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌超过 6%。【原文：Marvell Technology Inc. shares fell more than 6% in extended trading after the chipmaker cut the high end of its revenue forecast and postponed an investor day event, citing the “uncertain” economy.】

item.title: 交易员押注美联储开始降息需要更长时间
item.description: 交易商押注美联储今年的降息步伐将放缓，经济韧性将迫使政策制定者在2026年更大幅度放宽政策之前保持更长时间的按兵不动。【原文：Traders are betting on a slower pace of interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve this year, with economic resilience forcing policymakers to remain on hold for longer before easing more sharply in 2026.】

item.title: 业绩不佳，超微销售前景黯淡
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. gave a sales forecast in the current period that fell short of estimates, disappointing investors after the server maker last week released lackluster preliminary quarterly results for the previous quarter.】
